meanings.definition: Showing disapproval of others, especially those considered inferior.
meanings.sent1: She always acts snobby towards people she doesn't like.
meanings.sent2: The snobby girl refused to talk to anyone she deemed unworthy.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to make friends when you're too snobby to give anyone a chance.
meanings.sent4: Her snobby attitude made her isolated from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The snobby cat turned up its nose at the simple food offered.
